Name: condition_team_member_availability
Description: Ensure no team member is below a critical availability threshold

Name: condition_project_not_delayed
Description: Ensure the project end date does not exceed its planned deadline

Name: condition_high_severity_blockers_resolved
Description: Ensure no high-severity blockers remain unresolved

Name: condition_sprint_goal_met
Description: Ensure the primary sprint goal is at least partially achieved

Name: condition_budget_not_exceeded
Description: Ensure the project does not exceed its total budget

Name: condition_critical_skills_covered
Description: Ensure all skills marked as critical for the project are present

Name: condition_product_owner_available
Description: Ensure the Product Owner has sufficient availability

Name: condition_minimum_team_size
Description: Ensure the team has the minimum required number of members

Name: condition_feature_documented
Description: Ensure all high-priority features have documentation

Name: condition_stakeholder_representation
Description: Ensure key high-influence stakeholders participate in reviews
